result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy William Gast

records.addlTxt: NOH

2:42 PM Defendant Timothy William Gast appeared by phone.  Attorney Vincent Rust appeared by video for Timothy William Gast.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Atty asking for another STC have had some difficulty contacting def.  Court placing def and Atty in breakout room.  Back on the record at 2:48.  Atty asking for another STC.  State, asking for address and address the issue that def was supposed to appear in person for todays court date.  State will be ready any time after Feb. next year.  Atty def wants to resolve with a plea, asking for STC.   Scheduling order.  Def needs to appear in person for final STC.  Does not have an address, might have a PO Box in Ashland unsure of number.  
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for February 23, 2023 at 08:00 am.
Final status/scheduling conference scheduled for February 6, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
Final status/scheduling conference on February 6, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial - 12 person on February 23, 2023 at 08:00 am.

1:10 PM Defendant Timothy William Gast not in court.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Vincent Rust not in court.  Minutes reflect case was in court 11 days ago for STC and scheduled case for today.  State requesting in court appearance for next hearing.   Ordered for Defendant to appear in person, attorney can zoom.
Status conference scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on August 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:40 PM Defendant Timothy William Gast in court.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Vincent Rust appeared by video for Timothy William Gast.  Attorney received an offer from the State, has had some difficulty communicating, can set for plea and sentencing.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:25 PM Prosecuting attorney Ruth Diane Kressel appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Timothy William Gast in court.  Attorney Tom Locante appeared by video for Timothy William Gast.  Atty is asking for another STC, Ct will set trial date is case is not resolved at the next hearing.
Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on July 18, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on June 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

01:35 PM - Defendant Timothy William Gast not in court. Prosecuting Atty David V. Meany appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video means for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Attorney Vincent Rust appeared by video means for Defendant Timothy William Gast.  COVID - ZOOM; Atty spoke w/client 15 mins ago & thought client will be joining today, atty did call & got v-mail.  Problem at prev hring w/connection. 1:37 pm - Def now joins hring.  Ct adv's again service had better be good & not to be late for future hrings.  William Voss, sworn via video - Exam DA; Cross Atty.  DA makes argumt.  Ct finds PC def com fel in Ash Co; bound over for argnmt.  Info filed w/identical chgs as in compl, waives read of info, plea N/G to chgs.  DAP for def at next dte.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:09 AM Defendant Timothy William Gast in court with attorney Vincent Rust.  David V. Meany appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   COVID - ZOOM; all parties agree to appear via ZOOM today. Rec'd compl, waives reading, asking for a prelim. 
Parties can appear by zoom, the def needs to have strong, reliable cell service or Internet to appear  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on April 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

09:14 AM Defendant Timothy William Gast in court via Zoom phone.  David V. Meany appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  COVID - ZOOM; all parties agree to appear via ZOOM today. Court rec notice today that Pub Def is looking for an Atty but hasn't found one yet. Adjourn case. Def can appear via Zoom for next hearing.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report

***Def. signed bond after initially refusing to sign.***
Def shall not possess or consume any mind-altering substances meaning alcoholic beverages, controlled substances, inhalants, synthetic marijuana, or similar substances and/or over the counter medications used contrary to label instructions, or prescription medications not taken in compliance with a prescription issued to the defendant.  Def is not to go into any place where mind altering substances are present, maintained, sold or consumed, except defendant may enter a convenience store or grocery store, even if alcohol is sold there.
Defendant to have NO CONTACT with J.L.
Defendant may appear by Zoom at next hearing, 2/21/22 @ 11:00 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance on March 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

11:34 AM Defendant Timothy William Gast in court.  David V. Meany appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   COVID - ZOOM; all parties agree to appear via ZOOM today.  State comments- the def did sign his sign bond in the jail. COC will need to get a copy of the signed sign bond. Letter in the file-- PD is looking for an atty.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
